Inventory & Store Executive Job at Zhuli Recruiters




        
    

        
        Zhuli Recruiters is a recruitment firm that is committed to serving start-ups, is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Inventory & Store Executive

Job Locations: Ekiti, Enugu, Sokoto, Zamfara, Wukari - Taraba, Bida - Niger, Kogi, and Abakaliki - Ebonyi
Employment Type: Full-time
Work days: Monday - Saturday
Resumption Time: 8am - 5pm (Week days), 9am- 12pm(Saturday)

Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Inventory Management: Receive, issue, and record stock using FIFO; conduct daily counts and audits; manage faulty items and spare parts.
	Reporting: Prepare daily stock reports; track inventory movements for restocking or replacements.
	Repairs & Tools: Perform basic diagnostics and minor repairs; manage tools and warranty checks.
	Store & Customer Support: Keep store clean and safe; assist walk-in customers and support field agents.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent
	3+ years of experience in inventory, logistics, store-Keeping, or retail
	Proficient in Excel and Word
	Strong communication skills, integrity, and customer focus
	Familiarity with Wukari or Bida as a location

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Production Manager

Employment Type: Full-time

	Plan, organize, and control the production process to meet daily, weekly, and monthly output targets.

	Identify areas for process improvements and implement lean manufacturing practices.
	Ensure compliance with company policies, labour laws, and regulatory requirements.


Qualifications & Skills


	Bachelor’s degree in Production/Manufacturing Engineering, Industrial Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, or related field.

	Strong leadership, supervisory, and people-management skills.

	Leadership and decision-making

	Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines
	Team development and motivation
